DOC.brief_summary: The study is a double blind 2x2 factorial study. Patients with coronary disease will be randomly be assigned to L-arginine (9 g/day), creatine 21 g/d, both, or neither dietary supplement. The function of the endothelium will be tested using ultrasound before and after each treatment. These studies will help us understand why the endothelium is abnormal in patients with coronary artery disease and how L-arginine is acting on endothelial function.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Creatine and L-Arginine on Endothelial Function
DOC.criteria: Coronary artery disease Pregnancy Creatine use within one month of study Larginine use within one month of study Change in dose or initiation of lipid lowering therapy, aspirin therapy, or angiotensin converting enzyme therapy within one month of study
